note_content: Court-mandated patient following workplace altercation. Reports ongoing thoughts of harming former supervisor who he blames for his termination. States 'I've thought about going back there and teaching him a lesson.' When pressed on specifics, describes fantasies of physical confrontation but no concrete plan. Denies weapon access. No suicidal ideation. Discussed duty to warn obligations. Patient agreed to avoid workplace vicinity.
test_type: Active homicidal ideation toward identified victim, vague intent
